title: Napa vs. Sonoma Tasting
description:
Join us on Wednesday, April 9, from 4–7 PM at Whispering Vine South Creek for a side-by-side tasting of premium wines from two of California’s most iconic regions—Napa Valley and Sonoma County.

Tasting Fee: $35 (Waived with the purchase of any bottle from the tasting!)

Featured Wines:

  • Sinegal Estate Cabernet Sauvignon 2021 (Napa) – Deep and refined with dark cherry, mocha, sweet tobacco, and silky tannins.
  • Jordan Cabernet Sauvignon 2018 (Sonoma) – 95 pts, Tasting Panel. Elegant and layered with blue fruit, cassis, fig, and French oak influence.
  • Clos du Val Napa Valley Cabernet Sauvignon 2022 (Napa) – 96 pts, Tasting Panel. Savory and structured with plum, cedar, black tea, and balanced acidity.
  • Sinegal Details Sonoma 2021 (Sonoma) – Bright and expressive with black cherry, cassis, floral aromatics, and vibrant minerality.

Taste the nuances of Napa and Sonoma, and decide for yourself which region wins—buy a bottle and your tasting is free.
